help:
base - basic stuff
inventory (type inven) - used when in inventory mode
quest - commands relating to questing
dialog - commands for when in dialog

base.list:
base commands:
quit
inven
walk [destination]
list [options?]
peek [target]
combat commands:
list
status
attack [target]
rest

cmds.quit: quit - Exits the game. Requires a confirmation before exiting, unless in dev mode.
cmds.inven: inven - Opens the inventory. Inventory mode has its own section of commands (see {green}help inven{stop})
cmds.walk: walk [destination] - walks to [destination] where [destination] is a room name as listed by the 'list doors' command
cmds.talk: talk [uid] - talks to npc [uid] where [uid] is the 1-based index of the npc as it appears in the 'list npcs' command
cmds.rest: rest - has the player rest to regain stamina
cmds.loot: loot [uid] - loots chest [uid] where [uid] is the 1-based index of the chest as displayed in the 'list chests' command, this will fail if the player has no available inventory slots
cmds.peek: peek [destination] - lists the [destination] room where [destination] is the same as the 'walk' command
cmds.status: status - displays the player's status (health, attack/defense/mana pts, etc)

cmds.fill status: fill status - fill status - displays the number of currently used to available slots
cmds.drop: drop [uid] - drops item [uid] where [uid] is the 1-based index of the item as displayed using the 'list items' command
cmds.equip: equip [slot name] [uid] - equips item [uid] to slot [slot name] where [uid] is the same as the 'drop' command and [slot name] is the full name of the slot
cmds.list: list [target] - where [target] is one of ('inven' or 'items') to list inventory and 'body' to list body slots
